price: 82. Ceux qui ont cru et n’ont pas altéré leur foi par de l’injustice, ceux-là sont en sécurité et sont bien orientés.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِسُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنَهُم بِظُلۡمٍ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡنُ وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū walam yalbisū īmānahum biẓul'min ulāika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'tadūna
